mapper.sql: transaction_id, transaction_summary_id, item_id, item, po_number,po_header_id, po_line, io_type, io_status, car_number, driver_name, driver_phone, ship_date, scheduled_arrival_date, actual_arrival_date, transaction_date, transaction_piece, transaction_weight, warehouse, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id
mapper.select: select , (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.dict_data_code = p.io_type and ds.organization_id = p.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 8) as io_type_name, (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.dict_data_code = p.warehouse and ds.organization_id = p.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 1) as warehouse_name, (select ds.dict_data_name from sys_dict_datas ds where ds.id = (select pe.item_grade_id from po_line pe where pe.header_id = p.po_header_id and pe.line_id=p.po_line and pe.organization_id = p.organization_id) and ds.organization_id = p.organization_id and ds.dict_id = 13) as itemGradeName from material_transaction p
mapper.insert:
insert into material_transaction (transaction_summary_id, item_id, item, po_header_id, po_number, po_line, io_type, io_status, car_number, driver_name, driver_phone, ship_date, scheduled_arrival_date, actual_arrival_date, transaction_date, transaction_piece, transaction_weight, warehouse, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id) VALUES
(#{item.transactionSummaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.poNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.poLine,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ioType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ioStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shipDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.scheduledArrivalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.actualArrivalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.transactionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.transactionPiece,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.transactionWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into material_transaction (transaction_summary_id, item_id, item, po_header_id, po_number, po_line, io_type, io_status, car_number, driver_name, driver_phone, ship_date, scheduled_arrival_date, actual_arrival_date, transaction_date, transaction_piece, transaction_weight, warehouse, remarks, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id) values (#{transactionSummaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{poNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poLine,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ioType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ioStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scheduledArrivalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualArrivalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transactionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transactionPiece,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transactionWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update material_transaction set transaction_summary_id = #{transactionSummaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, po_number = #{poNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, po_header_id = #{poHeaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, po_line = #{poLine,jdbcType=BIGINT}, io_type = #{ioType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, io_status = #{ioStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, car_number = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_date = #{shipDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scheduled_arrival_date = #{scheduledArrivalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_arrival_date = #{actualArrivalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, transaction_date = #{transactionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, transaction_piece = #{transactionPiece,jdbcType=BIGINT}, transaction_weight = #{transactionWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
